title: 'Devil in the details': India-U.S. deal raises hopes for a reset â€” but the fine print remains unclear
summary_full: The U.S. and India have finalized a trade deal on Monday after months of negotiations, steadying a relationship that had plummeted to its lowest point in decades.
summary_public: The U.S. and India have finalized a trade deal on Monday after months of negotiations, steadying a relationship that had plummeted to its lowest point in decades.
